title: Python Developer
job_desc:
Teamified works with top enterprises and digital native businesses in Australia helping them build their remote teams in India, Philippines and Sri Lanka. We pride ourselves with hiring great teams to work on exciting game changing technology.

Teamified currently has 200+ engineers, testers, product managers etc. working across 20+ partners. We focus on uplifting the way organisations build and manage their remote teams through great working relationships, trust, integrity, culture and hiring processes. Additional to this we are building our own technology product offerings. We strive to deliver the best outcomes for our customers, our partners and our people.

Client Summary:

Our client is an Australian FinTech company that provides a platform for business credit cards and spend management. In essence, they offer a modern alternative to traditional corporate cards, designed to simplify spending for businesses, save time and money on financial administration, and give businesses greater control and visibility over their expenses. Their key services include providing Mastercard-powered credit cards to businesses, which can be issued to employees, and a spend management platform that allows businesses to track spending in real-time, capture receipts, categorize expenses, and automate reconciliation with accounting software. Our client also enables employees to use a mobile app to upload receipts and add notes, streamlining the expense reporting process.

Notably, our client does not charge any foreign transaction fee mark-ups and integrates with popular accounting software like Xero and SAP Concur. Additionally, our client provides controls and oversight features, allowing businesses to set spending limits, and lock or freeze cards. Our clients users can also earn Velocity Points on eligible spending.

Job Description

Role:

Seeking a passionate Senior Backend Engineer to drive implementation in a collaborative, fast-paced setting. The role involves translating technical challenges into business solutions, working with cross-functional teams, and contributing to a team that values communication and knowledge sharing. Strong technical skills and the ability to articulate ideas are crucial.

Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain robust backend systems using Python/Django

Architect and implement scalable API services and database models

Collaborate with DevOps to deploy and maintain services in GCP and Kubernetes environments

Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code

Debug and resolve complex issues in production systems

Contribute to architectural decisions that shape the platform&aposs future

Optimise system performance and address technical debt

Work closely with product and commercial teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions

Participate in code reviews to maintain high standards of code quality

Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines for backend services

Requirements:

5+ years of experience in backend development with Python

Strong proficiency with Django and Django REST Framework

Solid understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL preferred)

Experience with GCP services (Cloud Run, Cloud SQL, Cloud Storage, etc.)

Knowledge of containerisation technologies (Docker)

Familiarity with Kubernetes and container orchestration

Understanding of RESTful API design principles

Experience with version control systems (Git)

Ability to work independently and take ownership of projects

*Key Competencies

Experience with CI/CD tools and practices

Knowledge of infrastructure as code (Terraform)

Experience with monitoring and observability tools

Understanding of microservice architecture patterns

Experience with asynchronous processing and message queues

Background in fintech or financial systems

Contributions to open-source projects

Benefits PH

13th Month Pay

HMO

Leave Benefits

Skills and are eager to contribute to our teams success, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Apply now!

title: Senior Python Developer
job_desc:
Be a part of our fast-growing team and unchain all the possibilities!

What is your mission

We are looking for aSenior Python Developer. In this role, you will be responsible for the development, customization, and maintenance of Odoo modules, as well as the integration of AI-driven solutions to enhance business processes. You will work closely with the IT Director and collaborate with various teams to implement solutions that align with our companys objectives and technological goals.

You will provide the best service to our partner client by performing these tasks:

  • Design, develop, and customize Odoo modules to meet business requirements.
  • Integrate AI technologies with Odoo for process automation, predictive analytics, and improved decision-making.
  • Partner with DevOps and IT teams for the deployment and maintenance of Odoo systems.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues and bugs related to Odoo.
  • Document technical designs, processes, and changes in code.
  • Provide continuous support for system improvements, including AI-driven features.
  • Contribute to system analysis and design, utilizing AI insights.
  • Stay informed about the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and ERP systems.

Who are we looking for
  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • At least 5 years of experience in Python or Odoo development and implementation.
  • Proven expertise in AI technologies such as machine learning, natural language processing, or predictive analytics.
  • Strong proficiency in Python or the Odoo framework.
  • Familiarity with PostgreSQL, XML, JavaScript, and other Odoo technologies.
  • Solid experience in the full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
  • Knowledge of AI tools and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or OpenAI.
  • Exceptional problem-solving abilities and analytical thinking.
  • Must be available for full-time, onsite work in Ortigas, Pasig City.
  • Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with cross-functional teams and clients.
  • A collaborative mindset and a passion for teamwork.
  • Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus.

Company Perks
  • Above-industry salary package and incentives
  • Comprehensive HMO benefits and life insurance from day 1
  • Free learning and development courses for your personal and career growth
  • Dynamic company events
  • Opportunities for promotion
  • Free meals and snacks

title: Junior Python Developer
job_desc:
Position Overview

As an Entry-Level Python Developer, you will be part of a development team responsible for building and maintaining software applications and APIs using Python. You will work under the guidance of senior developers to contribute to coding, testing, and troubleshooting tasks.

Responsibilities

  • Assist in the development of Python applications and APIs.
  • Collaborate with team members to understand requirements and contribute to software design.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
  • Perform unit testing and debugging to identify and resolve issues.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide feedback.
  • Document code, processes, and procedures to ensure clarity and maintainability.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor&aposs degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  • Basic understanding of Python programming.
  • 1-year solid experience in Python
  • Familiarity with programming concepts and object-oriented principles.
  • Some exposure to version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies.
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience with:
    • SAP
    • Logistics
    • PHP
    • HTML5

title: Odoo and Python Developer
job_desc:
Company Description

YelloX Supply Chain Solutions is focused on optimizing supply chain operations through a solutions-based approach. We are your partner in supply chain management. We are your one-stop solution for supply chain challenges. Our technology-driven approach ensures that your products get from the source to the customer quickly, safely, efficiently, and in perfect condition. We help you save time, reduce costs, and improve customer satisfaction. Whether you&aposre selling online, managing a warehouse, or providing transportation logistics, we can help you optimize and streamline your operations, and maximize profit margin.

We have been constantly innovating and expanding our services to meet the diverse and dynamic demands of our clients. Whether it is e-commerce, warehousing, transport or distribution, we have the expertise, the network and the tools to deliver efficient and reliable business solutions.

Role Description

This is a project-based role for an Odoo and Python Developer. The Odoo and Python Developer will be responsible for back-end web development and system development. The role requires working closely with a business analyst to deliver high-quality solutions.

Qualifications

  • Experience in Back-End Web Development and System Development using Odoo and Python.
  • Proficiency in Database management and integration
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Team player with strong collaboration skills
  • Bachelor&aposs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field

title: Senior Python Developer
job_desc:
Intellectsoft is a software development company delivering innovative solutions since 2007. We operate across North America, Latin America, the Nordic region, the UK, and Europe.We specialize in industries like Fintech, Healthcare, EdTech, Construction, Hospitality, and more, partnering with startups, mid-sized businesses, and Fortune 500 companies to drive growth and scalability. Our clients include Jaguar Motors, Universal Pictures, Harley-Davidson, Qualcomm, and London Stock Exchange.Together, our team delivers solutions that make a difference. Learn more at www.intellectsoft.net

Our customer's product is an AI-powered platform that helps businesses make better decisions and work more efficiently. It uses advanced analytics and machine learning to analyze large amounts of data and provide useful insights and predictions. The platform is widely used in various industries, including healthcare, to optimize processes, improve customer experiences, and support innovation. It integrates easily with existing systems, making it easier for teams to make quick, data-driven decisions to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

Requirements

  • A degree in computer science or a related field
  • At least 5 years of experience in software development
  • Proficient in Python, especially with FastAPI or similar frameworks like Flask and Django
  • Skilled in building scalable backend systems, APIs, and microservices
  • Good problem-solving skills and ability to work well in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
  • Understanding of AI/ML concepts and experience integrating AI models into backend services
  • Excellent communication skills and English

Nice to have


  • Experience with cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
  • Familiarity with databases (SQL, NoSQL)
  • Experience in UI development using ReactJS would be a plus

Responsibilities


  • Crafting and deploying scalable backend systems, APIs, and microservices
  • Enforcing software development best practices, verifying design compliance with requirements, and ensuring timely delivery of high-quality work
  • Coding backend applications using Python, SQL, and NoSQL databases
  • Resolving issues within the backend application code
  • Designing and executing backend architecture
  • Documenting application modifications and creating updates

Benefits


  • 35 absence days per year for work-life balance
  • Udemy courses of your choice
  • English courses with native-speaker
  • Regular soft-skills trainings
  • Excellence enters meetups
  • Online/offline team-buildings

title: Python Developer
job_desc:
Position Type: Full-Time, Non-exempt


Compensation: Php 30k to 60k per month (All-in salary package)


Job Location: Philippines (Remote)


Job Highlights:



  1. Paid Time Off: Relax and recharge with paid vacation and sick leaves.

  2. Bonus Boost: Enjoy an extra bonus with our 13th month pay.

  3. Health Matters: Get comprehensive HMO coverage upon regularization.

  4. Weekends Free: Say goodbye to work on weekends and embrace personal time.

  5. Extra Earnings: Overtime opportunities available for additional income.

  6. Work-Ready: We provide the essential work device for seamless productivity.


Company Overview:


Theoria Medical is a comprehensive medical group and technology company dedicated to serving patients across the care continuum with an emphasis on post-acute care and primary care. Theoria serves facilities across the United States with a multitude of services to improve the quality of care delivered, refine facility processes, and enhance critical relationships. We offer a broad scope of services including multispecialty physician services, telemedicine, remote patient monitoring, and more. We currently operate primary care clinics and provide medical services to skilled nursing facilities in numerous states across the nation.


As a leading edge, innovative, and quality driven physician group, we continue to expand nationally. In pursuit of this, we continue to seek talented individuals to join our amazing team and care for our population. We wish to extend a warm welcome to all candidates interested in making a difference in healthcare delivery by joining the Theoria team.


We are seeking a highly skilled Python Developer to join our Data Science and Analytics department. As a Python Developer, your main responsibility will be to write scripts for automation projects. This role offers an excellent opportunity to work on an exciting projects and showcase your expertise in Python development.


Shift Structure



  • Monday-Friday 9 am-5 pm EST



Essential Functions & Responsibilities



  • Collaborate with the Data Science and Analytics team to identify automation needs and develop Python scripts to automate repetitive tasks

  • Write efficient, reusable, and scalable code using Python programming language

  • Design and implement solutions to enhance productivity and efficiency within the department

  • Analyze project requirements and provide accurate time estimates for completing tasks

  • Troubleshoot and debug existing Python scripts to ensure smooth execution

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate Python scripts into existing systems or workflows

  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in Python development



Requirements and Qualifications



  • Bachelor&aposs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field

  • Proven experience as a Python Developer, preferably in a data science or analytics environment

  • Strong proficiency in Python programming language and related frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask)

  • Familiarity with data manipulation and analysis using libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, or SciPy

  • Experience working with APIs and web services

  • Knowledge of SQL and database management systems

  • Good understanding of software development lifecycle and version control systems (e.g., Git)

  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills

  • Excellent communication and collaboration abilities

  • Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines



Physical Requirements



  • Must be punctual or on time and adhere to the company&aposs Time and Attendance policy.

  • Must be able to remain sitting for the majority of their shift.



Employees must be able to perform the essential functions of this position satisfactorily, with or without a reasonable accommodation. Employer retains the right to change or assign other duties to this position.

title: Python Developer
job_desc:
About the Job

We&aposre looking for a Python Developer to join our growing engineering team. Youll focus on developing custom Slack applications and integrations that solve real business problems for our clientsranging from hypergrowth startups to global enterprises. This is a unique opportunity to build high-impact apps that sit at the intersection of collaboration, automation, and AI.

About Bryd

Bryd is a premier global Slack-first Salesforce partner, dedicated to transforming workplace productivity and customer results through advanced solutions across both platforms. With a team of ex-Slack and Salesforce experts, we provide unmatched consulting, implementation, and custom application development to help businesses unlock the full potential of Slack, Salesforce, and AI-driven automation.

We are at the forefront of building Slack-first AI agents that revolutionize how teams collaborate, automate processes, and drive efficiency. Slack is the future of the Salesforce ecosystem, and this role provides a front-row seat to that transformation. This is not just another developer rolebut a chance to join a rocket-ship startup thats doubled in growth in six months, working with top-tier clients all over the world.

Key Responsibilities
  • Design and build scalable Slack apps using Python and Slacks SDKs (Bolt, Flask, etc.)
  • Integrate with external APIs (e.g., Salesforce, Jira, Notion, Google Workspace)
  • Maintain and improve existing app infrastructure with a focus on performance and security
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver new features and enhancements
  • Write clean, testable, and well-documented code
  • Participate in sprint planning, code reviews, and technical design discussions
  • Stay updated with Slack API changes and best practices in app development

Must-Have Qualifications
  • At least 5+ years of professional Python development experience
  • Strong experience with REST APIs, webhooks, and backend frameworks like Flask or FastAPI
  • Experience with Slack app development using Bolt for Python or similar SDKs
  • Familiarity with OAuth2, token management, and secure authentication flows
  • Experience deploying apps on platforms like Heroku, AWS, or similar
  • Strong understanding of Git, CI/CD, and agile workflows
  • Excellent communication and problem-solving skills

Nice-to-Haves
  • Experience integrating with Salesforce or other CRMs
  • Familiarity with Slack features like Modals, Home tabs, Slash commands, and Block Kit
  • Knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript and Node.js for cross-platform Slack development
  • Hands-on experience with Slacks new CLI and Slack Functions
  • Understanding of event-driven architectures, webhooks, and Socket Mode
  • Working knowledge of JSON, OAuth 2.0, and token management
  • Exposure to GraphQL APIs and advanced data handling
  • Experience deploying on serverless infrastructure (e.g., AWS Lambda)
  • Familiarity with observability tools (e.g., Sentry, Datadog) for error tracking
  • Contribution to open-source Slack apps or public GitHub projects
  • Interest in or experience with Slack AI and GPT-powered workflows

Perks & Benefits
  • Competitive local salary + performance bonuses
  • Work-from-anywhere policy with flexible hours
  • Paid time off and public holiday swaps
  • Learning budget for certifications, tools, and courses
  • Direct mentorship from ex-Slack engineers and consultants
  • Opportunity to work on high-impact projects for global brands
  • Fast-paced, collaborative startup environment

title: Python Developer
job_desc:
Sr Python Developer

FTE

Philippines-100% Remote (Work any where in Philippines )

Job Description:

We are looking for a Python Web Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application; therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.

Must have skills:

Python (Django, Flask), Tornado or Asynchronous Microservices, DB Skills Cloud knowledge

Skills:

Solid experience coding in Python and preferably in Retail domain experience

knowledge of GIT

Expert in Python, with knowledge of Python web framework.

Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture

Good understanding of server-side templating language

Code packaging, release, and deployment

Cloud working knowledge (AWS, Azure, GCP)

Database knowledge - MongoDB

Code versioning tools like Git, SVN, etc

Strong Unit testing and Debugging skills

Candidates need a strong understanding of REST API design and coding.

o They should be able to design APIs, write contracts, and handle HTTP verbs (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.) effectively.

Asynchronous Client Webservices:

o Experience in building asynchronous client webservices is crucial.

o Candidates are struggling in this area, making it a key focus for improvement.

Tornado Framework:

o Knowledge of Tornado is a plus, but not mandatory for the role.

MongoDB:

o Familiarity with MongoDB is extremely helpful and considered a huge plus for candidates.

Emphasize REST API design, including contract design and proper handling of HTTP verbs.

Focus on improving candidates&apos knowledge of asynchronous web services (understanding of frameworks like Tornado can be beneficial).

title: Python Developer
job_desc:
Description

ThePythonDeveloperwill be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining customer communication management (CCM) solutions tailored to client needs in a B2B environment. This role involves working closely with stakeholders to understand business objectives, providing technical expertise during pre-sales engagements, and ensuring seamless delivery of solutions within agreed timelines. You will collaborate with project teams to enhance workflow automation, customer communications, and data-driven content generation while maintaining compliance with security and industry standards.

Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and implement solutions to support client communication strategies.
  • Collaborate with internal teams and client stakeholders to gather requirements and develop technology solutions aligned with business objectives.
  • Provide technical expertise in Professional Service style B2B engagements, including technical support during client meetings and pre-sales discussions.
  • Ensure the accuracy, security, and scalability of solutions, adhering to industry best practices and regulatory frameworks.
  • Identify opportunities for process improvements and optimisation of client communication workflows.
  • Document technical designs, processes, and maintain comprehensive client-facing documentation.
  • Support integration of CCM solutions with existing systems, ensuring smooth data exchange and content management.
  • Troubleshoot issues and provide timely resolutions to meet client needs and service-level agreements (SLAs).

Skills and Qualifications

  • A degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or related field preferred.
  • Previous experience within the Direct Communications Industry or withstructured programming environment, or similar.
  • Minimum 2 years experience with C# or similar .NET technologies in the Enterprise space including .NET Core and .NET Standard
  • Experience with the any of the following technologies:
  • C/C++
  • BASH scripting
  • Python
  • Delphi
  • Customer Communication Management (CCM) tools e.g. GMC/Quadient, Exstream, Emtex, PReS, XMPie
  • Minimum 2 years experience with Microsoft SQL Server or similar technologies in the Enterprise space
  • Demonstratable knowledge and experience with:
  • Object-Orientated Programming (OOP)
  • Test Driven Development
  • .NET Web technologies including ASP.NET MVC
  • Microsoft SQL Server design and integration
  • Source Code management repositories
  • Effective at communicating with stakeholders at various levels of technological skill
  • Be able to demonstrate a high level of organisation and time management.
  • Willing to work onsite in Alabang Muntinlupa. (Hybrid)

title: Python Developer
job_desc:

  • 4 years - IT graduation is mandatory (need to have a valid TOR and Diploma)
  • Good knowledge of programming knowledge Python.

title: Python Developer
job_desc:
Company Description

Lightweight Solutions is dedicated to creating a smarter, sustainable, and more enjoyable world through technology. We focus on innovative and smart solutions that have a positive impact on improving quality of life while meeting global economic, social, and environmental goals.

Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role located in Quezon City for a Software Developer. The Software Developer will be responsible for back-end web development, software development, object-oriented programming (OOP), programming, and databases.

Qualifications
  • Back-End Web Development and Software Development skills
  • Proficiency in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and Programming
  • Experience with Databases
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment

title: Full Stack Python Developer
job_desc:
Our US Partner Client is the fastest-growing SaaS solution in the third-party logistics market. Keeping up with the massive increase in online retail activity from companies like Amazon, Shopify, Target, and the growth in supply chain logistics can be challenging for warehouses. Born within an active 3PL warehouse, they are the first cloud-based warehouse management platform to better serve customers and increase warehouse efficiencies to grow their businesses. They pride themselves on understanding and delivering best practices and excellence to 3PLs and their customers.

We are seeking a skilled Full-Stack Developer proficient in Python and modern front-end frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular) to develop and optimize web applications. Responsibilities include building UIs, managing RESTful APIs, automating tasks, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to enhance system efficiency. Strong problem-solving skills, Git, and an Agile mindset are essential.

This is a full-time role, on a US shift and on a Hybrid work set-up.

If you have the right skill set, this may be your opportunity to enter this fast-growing organization.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Develop, maintain, and troubleshoot tools and applications using Python on the backend.
  • Build and enhance front-end features using React, Vue, or Angular, applying solid CSS concepts for responsive and modern design.
  • Create and consume RESTful APIs to integrate various system components and services.
  • Write and maintain scripts to automate repetitive tasks, optimize workflows, and improve overall system efficiency.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, particularly Customer Service Representatives, to address system issues and develop solutions that simplify their processes.
  • Participate in code reviews, contribute to design discussions, and help establish best practices for support and full-stack development.

QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Experience in Python programming, including familiarity with frameworks and libraries for backend development.
  • Competence with one or more modern front-end frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular) and in-depth understanding of CSS/HTML.
  • Solid knowledge of RESTful API concepts: how to build, integrate, and maintain them.
  • Proficiency in scripting (e.g., Python scripts, Shell scripts) to automate tasks and handle system-level operations.
  • Familiarity with version control (e.g., Git) and Agile development methodologies.
  • Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to manage multiple tasks effectively.

title: Python Developer
job_desc:
Job Description

We need a Python Engineering Developer who will join our Python Innovation team designed to teach both beginner and advanced coders how to create innovative solutions, provide opportunities for collaboration and experiential learning, build a Python community, and further promote our data and efficiency driven culture. The team is primarily focused on empowering innovation through automation, pushing employees to work smarter, not harder.

With thousands of newly trained coders, we are looking for an experienced coder to partner with these citizen developers to build solutions, provide code reviews, assist with troubleshooting, and creating their own innovation solutions.

This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:

  • Advanced Python knowledge and coding ability; having 2+ years of experience is a plus
  • Strong communication skills
  • Strong organizational skills with high attention to detail
  • Passion for helping others succeed and providing them with technical support and coaching
  • Desire to foster and advance a strong Python community
  • Inherent curiosity and drive towards innovation
  • Ability to work on a small team, drive initiatives, and be a self-starter

IF YOURE THE REALLY GOOD PERSON FOR THIS ROLE, YOU GET:

  • A full-time employment and an opportunity to be regularized in as short as 3 months;
  • A competitive salary package based on your work experience and skills;
  • HMO coverage upon regularization;
  • Company-sponsored gym benefit upon regularization;
  • Quarterly Performance Bonus;
  • Perfect Attendance Bonus;
  • 10 accrued Sick Leave credits in a year unused ones are commutable to cash; and
  • 10 Vacation Leave credits in a year, among others; and
  • A massive opportunity to expand your development expertise and work for a big financial services company.

title: Python Developer
job_desc:
We are seeking a talented Python Developer with a strong background in data engineering and a proven track record of working with the Databricks platform. As a Python Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining data pipelines, ETL processes, and data-driven applications.

Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and deploy robust and scalable data pipelines using Python and PySpark on the Databricks platform.
  • Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, and business analysts to understand data requirements and translate them into efficient data solutions.
  • Optimize data ingestion, transformation, and loading processes to improve performance and reliability.
  • Develop and maintain data quality checks and monitoring systems to ensure data accuracy and integrity.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve complex data issues and system failures.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the data engineering and data science fields.

Profile

  • Minimum Diploma or Bachelors in Engineering or related degree
  • Strong proficiency in Python programming language, including data manipulation and analysis. Hands-on experience with the Databricks platform, including notebooks, clusters, and data pipelines. Solid understanding of data engineering concepts, ETL processes, and data warehousing.
  • Proficiency in SQL and experience working with relational and NoSQL databases.
  • Experience with machine learning and AI frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and their data services.
  • Knowledge of data version control tools like Git.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills

title: Full-Stack Developer (Python/Django & React)
job_desc:
About One Outsource Direct Corp (OODC)

Established in 2003, One Outsource Direct Corporation (OODC) is a Philippine-based company engaged in providing business process outsourcing (BPO) services to local and international companies. For over 21 years, we have been providing value-driven solutions to our customers globally, enabling them to achieve scalability and growth.

Join One Outsource

To be part of OODC means to be part of a team of go-getters. We are inspired to take responsibility, to learn new things, to initiate action, and to provide better customer experiences. As a boutique service BPO, we provide career opportunities that allow our passionate team members to excel, learn, and achieve career success quickly.

We are looking for a skilled Full-Stack Developer with expertise in Python (Django Rest Framework) and JavaScript (React.js & React Native). The ideal candidate should have experience with Anaconda, Jupyter, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Scikit-Learn for data processing and analysis. Familiarity with version control (GitHub) and deployment on AWS & DigitalOcean is required.

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Develop and maintain RESTful APIs using Django Rest Framework (DRF). Build responsive web applications using React.js and mobile apps using React Native.
  • Work with Anaconda, Jupyter, Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for data visualization and analysis. Implement machine learning models using Scikit-Learn when necessary.
  • Optimize database queries and manage data pipelines efficiently. Collaborate with the team using GitHub for version control.
  • Deploy, monitor, and scale applications on AWS and DigitalOcean. Troubleshoot and debug issues across the full stack.
  • Proficiency in Python and Django Rest Framework for backend development. Strong experience with React.js and React Native for frontend and mobile app development. Hands-on experience with data analysis libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib).
  • Familiarity with Jupyter Notebook for data exploration and visualization. Knowledge of machine learning concepts using Scikit-Learn is a plus.
  • Experience with version control (GitHub) for collaborative development. Ability to deploy applications using AWS and DigitalOcean. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

QUALIFICATIONS

  • Experience working with Docker and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Knowledge of cloud infrastructure and DevOps best practices.
  • Previous experience with API authentication and security best practices.
  • Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team.

SKILLS

Python (Django Rest Framework)

Anaconda, Jupiter, Pandas Numpy, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn

Docker

Javascript (React js, React Native)

Version control (Github)

Deployment (AWS, Digital Ocean)

title: Full Stack Developer (React/Node/Python) - Nightshift/WFH
job_desc:
Job Description:

  • Analyzing error logs and user reports to identify the root cause of software bugs or malfunctions.
  • Writing small pieces of code to fix specific bugs or address immediate issues within the software.
  • Stepping through code to identify where errors are occurring and finding solutions.
  • Verifying that code patches resolve the issue without introducing new problems.
  • Communicating with developers to discuss bug fixes, feature requests, and potential code improvements.
  • Providing technical support to users by explaining complex issues in a clear and understandable way.
  • Work with Senior Developers and other Web application team members to solve complex application problems and development challenges.
  • Consult with clients (internal and external) to gather information about needs, objectives, functions, performance expectations, and input and output requirements.
  • Examine and comprehend functional requirements and specifications documents to assess the inclusion of all necessary elements. If any elements are missing, ask clients to update the specifications accordingly.
  • Identify and propose technical alternatives to solving client requests and system problems and recommend the best alternative by weighing client requirements, functionality, performance, time to implement, long-term maintainability, extensibility, and customer self-sufficiency.
  • Create written documentation and diagrams as required and/or requested, which are clear and can be understood by colleagues and managers.
  • Documentation may include technical specifications, technical alternatives, structure charts, data flow diagrams, etc. for both new programs and for modifications to existing programs.
  • Serve as a technical resource for other teams.
  • Provide training to other members of the team in web technology as directed.
  • Provide production support and on-call support including problem analysis and resolution, including during and after work hours.
  • Collaborate with various groups (clients, help desk, technical infrastructure staff) to identify and resolve application issues.
  • Monitor and update issue logs with status and resolution information per project standards, department standards, and/or as requested.

Non-negotiable Qualifications:
  • Bachelor's degree and 3-5+ years of experience or
    equivalent professional experience.
  • A degree concentration in Computer Information Systems, Management Information Systems, or Computer
    Science is preferred.
  • Mid-level to advanced experience with databases, SQL
    (Postgres preferred), and APIs - Able to create queries
    to retrieve records, an understanding of the underlying
    data structures, an ability to interact with, and
    troubleshoot JSON, and REST APIs.
  • Mid-level to advanced experience working with AWS
    Services such as Cloudwatch.
  • Experience managing complex datasets, identifying
  • Experience managing complex datasets, identifying trends within the data, and performing comparisons between multiple data sources
  • Experience with Programming languages (HTML, Python, Java, JavaScript) is a plus
  • Experience with React and Node.js.
  • Troubleshoot problems using local and cloud-hosted tools.
  • Deployment and maintenance of configuration management tools like Ansible, Git, Prometheus, Grafana, Docker, KVM, QEMU, etc.
  • Scripting skills with Python, PowerShell, and/or Bash.
  • Deep curiosity for understanding how things work, especially as it applies to technology and its underlying framework
  • Exceptional troubleshooting, analytical, and problem-solving skills
  • Experience working as part of a distributed team and communicating with both technical and non-technical users.

title: Python & PowerShell Developer
job_desc:
Introduction: We are seeking a skilled and versatile Python & PowerShell Developer to join our dynamic IT team. In this role, you will contribute to automating and optimizing infrastructure processes, as well as building scalable solutions for system management and Active Directory integrations. This is an exciting opportunity for individuals with strong programming expertise, hands-on experiencein infrastructure automation, and a keen interest in improving system efficiencies through coding.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop, maintain, and optimize Python and PowerShell scripts for system administration and infrastructure automation.

Automate workflows for Active Directory (AD) management, user provisioning, permissions handling, and other directory services.

Design and implement automation solutions for deployment, configuration management, monitoring, and reporting.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify areas for process improvement, automation, and infrastructure enhancements.

Manage and troubleshoot existing Python and PowerShell scripts, ensuring reliability and optimal performance.

Integrate and support tools for infrastructure as code (IaC), monitoring, and system configuration automation.

Build and maintain reporting solutions, dashboards, and alerts for system monitoring and performance.

Provide support in managing servers, networks, and storage systems using automation frameworks.

Develop solutions to streamline Active Directory management tasks, including group policy updates, user lifecycle management, and security settings enforcement.

Participate in code reviews, ensuring the highest standards of quality and security.

Keep up-to-date with the latest trends in cloud automation and IT infrastructure best practices.

Required Skills and Experience:

Programming Languages: At least 5 years expertise in Python (including libraries like os, subprocess, requests, json, etc.) and PowerShell.

Infrastructure Knowledge: MinExperience with core infrastructure technologies such as Active Directory, EntraID, DNS, DHCP, and Windows Server.

Automation & Scripting: Proven ability to automate tasks such as user provisioning, system configuration, server maintenance, and data management.

Microsoft Power Automate: Experience in Microsoft Power Automate is a desirable.

Cloud Experience: Familiarity and expertise with Microsoft Azure cloud platform.

Automation Frameworks: Familiarity with tools like Ansible for infrastructure automation is a plus.

System Administration: Strong understanding of system administration, including networking, system monitoring, and troubleshooting.

Security: Knowledge of security practices, especially in user management, access control, and security automation within an enterprise environment.

Communication & Collaboration: Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to work in a team environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in Python, PowerShell, Power Automate, EntraID and Active Directory.

Minimun 5 years of experience of programing and Infrastructure.

University degree of IT in computer science or equivalent.

title: Full Stack Developer - Python (Work from home)
job_desc:
Degree in Information Technology or equivalent
Must have minimum 5-10 years of experience in Full Stack Development
Must have minimum 5 years of experience in Java (Spring Boot) and Python (Fast API) for backend development and Unix Shell scripts
Must have experience in web technologies HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and AJAX.
Good to have experience in ReactJS and NodeJS
Must have experience in databases both SQL (Oracle, MySQL) and NOSQL (DynamoDB)
Must have experience in AWS cloud services and deployment
Must have knowledge of RESTful APIs and Integration Techniques
Must have experience in database systems (e.g., SQL, NoSQL) and ORM libraries
Must have experience in version control using GIT
Good to have knowledge on CI/CD Pipeline and Terraform
Excellent written and verbal communications skills

title: Full-stack Developer (Odoo/Python)
job_desc:
Job Overview:

We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Python/Odoo Developer to join our development team. The ideal candidate will have at least 5 years of experience in Odoo development, with expertise in both frontend and backend development. This role requires deep knowledge of Odoos framework, customization capabilities, and integrations, ensuring seamless functionality across modules.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and customize Odoo modules (Sales, CRM, Inventory, Accounting, HR, etc.) based on business needs.

Design, develop, and maintain both frontend and backend components of Odoo applications.

Implement RESTful APIs and third-party integrations to enhance Odoo functionalities.

Optimize and troubleshoot Odoo performance issues, database queries, and server configurations.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement solutions.

Develop and maintain custom themes and UI enhancements using Odoos templating engine (XML, JavaScript, and CSS).

Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented Python and JavaScript code.

Perform Odoo upgrades and migrations to ensure system stability and performance.

Maintain security best practices, including access control, data protection, and user authentication.

Required Qualifications:

5+ years of experience in Odoo development with expertise in both backend and frontend.

Proficiency in Python, PostgreSQL, XML, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and QWeb.

Strong understanding of Odoos ORM, Workflows, Controllers, and Views.

Experience with Odoo API (XML-RPC, JSON-RPC) and third-party integrations.

Ability to customize Odoo modules and build custom applications within the Odoo framework.

Familiarity with Odoo deployment, hosting, and server configurations (Linux, Nginx, Docker).

Experience in Odoo upgrades and migration across different versions.

Strong knowledge of frontend technologies such as Bootstrap, jQuery, and OWL (Odoo Web Library).

Knowledge of Odoo.sh, Git, and CI/CD pipelines is a plus.

Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with multi-company and multi-currency setups in Odoo.

Understanding of Agile development methodologies.

Knowledge of AWS, Kubernetes, and DevOps tools for Odoo hosting.
